update t_sys_resource set
name=#{name},
link=#{link},
type=#{type},
pid=#{pid},
descp=#{descp},
iconCls=#{iconCls},
script=#{script},
createDt=#{createDt},
createUser=#{createUser},
updateDt=#{updateDt},
updateUser=#{updateUser},
enable=#{enable},
isLeaf=#{isLeaf},
orde=#{orde},
id=id
id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_sys_resource id=#{id} and isLeaf <> 0
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_sys_resource where pid=#{pid}

select * from t_sys_resource where id in (SELECT DISTINCT m.id FROM t_sys_resource m, t_sys_privilege p, t_sys_role r, t_sys_user u, t_sys_user_role ur WHERE (m.type=0 or m.type=1) AND u.id = ur.userId AND r.id = ur.roleId AND ((p.`master` = 'role' AND p.masterValue = r.id) or (p.`master`='user' and p.masterValue=u.id)) AND p.access = 'menu' AND p.accessValue=m.id AND u.id = #{userId}) order by orde;
SELECT p.id, r.* FROM t_sys_resource r LEFT JOIN t_sys_privilege p ON p.accessValue = r.id AND p.`master` = #{master} AND p.masterValue = #{masterValue}
